comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Any reason LOC is not using the original caption where accurate?  In this case, you are omitting key info.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: @artolog: The SABR project focused on naming players and teams, using a stock pattern to devise for titles that replaced the severely abbreviated words scratched on the negatives.  The words on the negatives were retained in the notes area.  In this case, though, you're right. This negative has a full-blown title that identifies the scene well.  We'll exchange the titles and subject notes. -- Helena
